message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $15,000. I am offering this exceptional item to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a product that matches your needs and expectations at a price that is more favorable than what others might offer. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.
